messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Right lets get things straight, the chap is NOT a traitor. The weapon he has was his holy weapon or whatever ... basically it was fake.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Engineering SMES.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Right now that everything has calmed down, a report of dead people. One the HOP is dead. Two other people. Thank you

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Pod Three.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Borgstation's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Borgstation, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright crew, I say we all head for the hotel and make it home. Power is an issue here but not there. bring anything you can we are moving boys and girls

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chapel Office.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: To all crew that has not left yet, The hotel is already set on the teleporter and the door is wide open bring anything you can. It is a safe place there with all departemnts except cargo because no one likes cargo (I do)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Borgstation's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Borgstation door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.
